relevance_explanation: The routine includes only steps relevant to the customer based on the customer data. Steps related to inactive accounts, zero balances, low/medium payment urgency, financial assistance checks, and late fee waivers were appropriately pruned.
completeness_explanation: All necessary logic, tool calls, and branches that apply to this customer (customer with high urgency, credit card payment method, and no payment plan in place) have been preserved. The routine correctly handles potential fraud check failures and 3DS authentication failures.
